amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace provisions in H.R. 1837 that override state law with a provision upholding state law and requiring use of the best available science.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-405 to replace provisions in H.R. 1837 that override state law with a provision upholding state law and requiring use of the best available science.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 244 (Roll no. 89).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Markey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 244 (Roll no. 89).
